derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin semicirculus (see semi-, circle)

entry.def: A semi-circle is one half of a circle, or something having the shape of half a circle.

example.ex: They stood in a semi-circle round the teacher's chair and answered questions.
example.tran: 他们围着老师的椅子站成半圆形回答问题。

means.word_mean: 1. a plane figure with the shape of half a circle
